players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. I acted alone last night."
You: "I'll watch both of you closely. Charlie, expect my investigation next night."
Bob: "Will keep my eyes open. Thanks for the tip, Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on both of us. I'll make my move tonight."
You: "Charlie, stay cautious. Bob, keep your motives clear."
Bob: "Will observe carefully. Stay safe, everyone."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
